title: Code segments that move robot along same path

content.question: Which of the following code segments will move the robot from the center square along the same path as the code segment above?

choices.label: count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0REPEAT 4 TIMES{count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> count + 1REPEAT count TIMES{MOVE_FORWARD()}ROTATE_LEFT()}

count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0REPEAT 4 TIMES{count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> count + 1ROTATE_LEFT()REPEAT count TIMES{MOVE_FORWARD()}}

count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0REPEAT 4 TIMES{REPEAT count TIMES{ROTATE_LEFT()}MOVE_FORWARD()count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> count + 1}

count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0REPEAT 4 TIMES{ROTATE_LEFT()REPEAT count TIMES{MOVE_FORWARD()}count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> count + 1}

content.answer: count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0REPEAT 4 TIMES{count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> count + 1REPEAT count TIMES{MOVE_FORWARD()}ROTATE_LEFT()}
